summary: Not lore friendly Mod.Some people are saying Afro hair is lore friendly.Add New  42 female Hair Style. Also you can use only one type of male.Humanraces only.To all races correspondence Afro!!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=4][center]


This hair meshes made by Hepsy.
I have gained the permission of the conversion from hepsy,before initial release this Mod[/center][/size]
[/color]



[font=Courier New][b][center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/59661-2-1447238768.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][youtube]FiLu7oKWLaw[/youtube][youtube]RB8-NRV1WO0[/youtube]

[youtube]WKrGj3afD70[/youtube][/center][/b][size=6][center][/center][/size][/font][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#c27ba0][size=5][i][/i][/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=5][i]
[/i][/size][/color][/font][center]Video made [url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBRmzqswNKBPnUZW2df3DPw]VatiWah[/url] & [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOyXRkpN_S1Hyyt3kyRG7g]FeuerTin[/url] & [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/MMOxReview]MxR Mods[/url][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=5][i]


Discription[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[color=#000000]IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII

[/color][b][size=4][color=#ffff00]This mod is not lore friendly!!!
Some people are saying Afro hair is lore friendly.[/color]
[/size][/b][color=#00ffff][size=3]This mod adds new hairstyles.
There are no plans to the corresponding hairstyle other than Afro,Since it is hard to be fit into the scruff of other races neck.
[/size][/color][center][color=#00ffff][size=3]
[/size][/color][b][size=4][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/59661-0-1447238768.jpg[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/59661-1-1447238768.jpg[/img][img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-NYddJDieyi4/VF1L-OhN2lI/AAAAAAAAAbU/iq9UE8V2lTY/s900/fordiscription900.png[/img]
[/size][/b][/center][b][size=4]

[/size][/b]
I am not good at English.enough support might be difficult. please tell me in simple english if you find a problem or bug.
please read this page and readme. especially FAQ please read.


[i][color=#ffe599][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Rec[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]ommended Mods[/size][/font][/color][/i]
[color=#000000]IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer[/url] by kapaer
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team [color=#ffff00]or[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] by Expired
Recommended reason ECE or RM, please read the FAQ.
If you use the latest Racemenu, you do not have to install the Showracemenu Precache Killer anymore.those mod require [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url].[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]

[/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=5][i]Install & Uninstall[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[color=#000000]IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII[/color]

[size=4][color=#fff2cc]Manual Install[/color]
[/size]1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Please copy the texture, the mesh, and the hepsyhair.esp into the data folder from among 00 main folder. It is optional to choose the color of hair accessories from in the folder named 01color
3. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the hepsyhair.esp file.

[color=#fff2cc][size=4]Manual Uninstall[/size][/color]
[size=2]1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the hepsyhair.esp file.
2.Delete the files you installed. 
[/size][size=2]Deletelist

Data/Texture/Hepsy/chmg-001_n.dds

[/size][color=#fff2cc][size=4]N.M.M. Install[/size][/color]
NMM ready package with install wizard.Please choose one color from among the six hair accessoriecolors.

[color=#fff2cc][size=4]N.M.M. Uninstall[/size][/color]
Simply uncheck this mod on NMM.


[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][color=#ffd966]FAQ[/color][/i]
[/size][/font][color=#000000]IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color]:Bangs are too long[/b] 
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:If you don't use the Enhanced Character Edit or Racemenu yet,I recommend that you use.And lower the eye height slider.

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color]:Behind the ear is bald[/b] 
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:If you use the Enhanced Character Edit or Racemenu Already,it will be solved by the height of the ear slider to a number close to the Vanilla.

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color][/b]:It is not possible to merge the mod so esm.
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:I was prepared esp plugins in OPTIONAL FILES. Are not included this in the main fomod wizard so that it does not mess for beginner.

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color][/b]:Can you upload afro  hair as standalone? Please.
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:Now supports.

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color][/b]:Not lore friendly! It does not suit to my character!
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:At least I never solve with respect to individual preferences.

[b][color=#ff0000]Q[/color]:Is there a release schedule of HDT version?[/b] 
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]:NO.


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=5][i]History[/i][/size][/color][/font]
[color=#000000]IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII[/color]

2.0, 2015/11/11 -  :Adds new 12 hair styles & new hair 41.
　　                         :Fixed known issues.
                             :The corresponding existing women's hair to Orc Females
                             :The color of the accessory when 
                               it changes the color of the hair has to remain unchanged.
1.11, 2015/01/13 - :Texture Fix
1.1,   2014/11/09 - :I was corresponding to all of the races the Afro hair.
                              :I was prepared  add only the Afro version.
1.0,   2014/11/08 - :Initial release.
